hero.title: Give Your Shop a Digital Front Door with Nova Phantom
hero.description: Create a clean, modern website for your store — no backend, no monthly hosting. Let your customers browse your products and order directly through WhatsApp or social media.

features.title: Features

cards.title: WhatsApp Order Button

cards.title: Mobile-First Design
